description:
Elpeo Ple has an upbeat and energetic character who delights in things that make her feel good, such as ice cream, baths and Judau Ashta. She views the world as her playground to reasonable degree, but can be very serious when she needs to be. She enjoys piloting her Qubeley and wants nothing more than to play with Judau, who she is attracted to by a Newtype connection.
Source: gundam.wikia.com
name: Elpeo Ple
